text1: They 've caught his eye . In quot ; helping themselves , quot ; Ricky Bryant , Chas Gessner , Michael Jennings , and David Patten did nothing Friday night to make Bill Belichick 's decision on what to do with his receivers any easier .
Apple recalls 28 , 000 batteries . APPLE has issued a safety recall for 28 , 000 batteries for its Powerbook notebooks , saying they posed a potential fire hazard .
